hadiths.text: Abu Musa' reported that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said:When it will be the Day of Resurrection Allah would deliver to every Muslim a Jew or a Christian and say: That is your rescue from Hell-Fire

chapter.ara-name: باب قَبُولِ تَوْبَةِ الْقَاتِلِ وَإِنْ كَثُرَ قَتْلُهُ
chapter.eng-name: The Acceptance Of The Repentance Of The One Who Kills, Even If He Has Killed A Great Deal
